Package pizzapizza

Class CurrentOrderController

java.lang.Object
pizzapizza.CurrentOrderController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CurrentOrderController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The CurrentOrderController class is the controller for the current order view in the main application.
Author:
Sibi suriyanarayan Tiruchirapalli venketaramani, Rahulraj Rajesh

    • prices

      public Double[] prices()
      Calculates the prices for the current order and returns an array containing the subtotal, sales tax, and total price.
      Returns:
      An array containing the subtotal, sales tax, and total price of the current order.
